creditline: Anonymous gift in memory of Kenji Nakahashi and in honor of Robert Cozzolino
description: abstract image; small predominately unrelated geometric forms overall including grey squares in corners, pink lozenge form at left center with six brown squares, brown rounded lines in crosses with green square and black and white dots in LRQ, blue square at top center with yellow oval, zigzagging purple and blue forms in ULQ, green lozenge in ULQ, blue arc over a grey half-circle with blue below and black trapezoid at left center; pinkish, blue, and yellow toned ground; received with yellowed glassine overlay sheet taped with masking tape to one short end
signed: LRQ on green rectangles in black: KENJI / N.
title: Rockefeller Center
